name: The Tachara Palace
description:
I know that one day, we will get to rebuild you
to have your beauty and elegance back. That might sound like a dream, but I know it will come true. For now, I will recreate you in my mind, heart, and soul until that day comes.

The Tachara Palace
The fifth NFT of Persepolis NFTs collection
Reconstruction of the Tachara palace in Persepolis 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿
It was built by the founder of Persepolis "Darius the Great" in 550 BC in Persia.
